card.name: CW - Image Viewer Limitations Per Client

data.text:
Hi @cobuspienaar 

The limitations would need to be set as one or more or all as follows:

1. Limited per what has been extracted to the client to date.
2. Limited by date range of verified date. i.e. From 1 Jan 2014 onward etc.
3. Limited to a specific type and reason of document. i.e. Only Debt Review or only Judgment by Default - Bond etr.
4. Limited to a type of entity. i.e. Only Consumer or only Commercial entities.
